category.name: Active Workspace.Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration Active Workspace preferences

preference.name: IMDSINTEGRATIONAW_AllowOnlyIMDSDeclarationForRequest
preference.preference_description: Indicates if only IMDS request should be allowed for IMDS objects. Valid values are: true : Allow only IMDS request. This is the default value. false: Allow IMDS, MSD and CMD request
